name: The Temple of the Light
description:
This game is a submission for Lux Jam,  48 hours game jam challenge.

Darkness rises underground people scream in terror.  Someone yells in the background: What is going on! All the lights go out. Darkness holds the entire world except for the lamp of hope, and monsters start to arise from the darkness. And the old man says: "It looks like the prophecy was true. You, little girl, are the chosen one. And you must take the lamp of hope to the ultimate light source to restore the light for our world."
